description: Manage the fallback route of an IoT hub.

commands.name: az iot hub message-route fallback set
commands.summary: Enable or disable the fallback route in an IoT Hub.
examples: az iot hub message-route fallback set -n {iothub_name} --enabled true
az iot hub message-route fallback set -n {iothub_name} --enabled false

commands.name: az iot hub message-route fallback show
commands.summary: Show the fallback route of an IoT Hub.
commands.syntax:
az iot hub message-route fallback show --hub-name
                                       [--resource-group]
examples: az iot hub message-route fallback show -n {iothub_name}
